Articles.Content: I would like to rework kerbal models and I'm interested is it possible?

There is a cfg (part) file for female and male Kerbals somewhere inside the squad folder. From memory there is a line in that cfg that states to location and/or name of the model. Find the config and you've found the model.  That might be able to be messed around with. 

Edited December 8, 2016 by Benji13
